pages.text: $(li)Compass are useful for travelers, they are always pointing to the Spawnpoint.$(br)$(li)You can change the place that is pointing a Compass with a Lodestone.

$(li)The Compass can be used to craft a Soul Compass, Nature's Compass, Empty Map, or Empty Antique Atlas.$(br)$(li)Cartographers will exchange your Compass by Emeralds.$(br)$(li)Masters Cartographers will exchange your Emeralds and Compass by a Levitation Stone.
